channel.title: Detectron 2 on Haozheng Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Detectron 2 on Haozheng Lin

item.title: Instance Segmentation for Application to Deformable Linear Objects
item.description: Abstract For detecting deformable linear objects (DLO), such as cables, CNN based methods are insufficient for industrial use, such as for bin picking task. In this paper, based on various baseline model from state of the art (s.o.t.a), the difficulties of detecting cables are found, and depends on those, we’ve developed a combination of a 2 stage vision Transformer with HTC framework (Fig. 1) to reach the best performance of detecting cable with s.
